query.statement:
SELECT CHAR(ROWNUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY A.WRKLFN, C.ZZACTSS)) AS ROWNUM, A.PSPID, A.POSID, B.ZSITE_NM, C.ZSPEC1, C.ZSPEC2, A.WRKLFN, A.GBN, (SELECT X.NAME1 FROM SAPHEE.LFA1 AS X WHERE X.MANDT = A.MANDT AND X.LIFNR = A.WRKLFN) AS WRKLFN_NM,
TRIM(E.MCOD3)||TRIM(E.STRAS) AS ADDR, E.J_1KFREPRE AS REP, C.NAMET AS PM, --TEAMÁ¦°Å -- (CASE WHEN C.ZZACTSS = '02' AND C.ZTEAM = '' THEN '°­³²ÆÀ' -- WHEN C.ZZACTSS = '02' AND C.ZTEAM = 'X' THEN '°­ºÏÆÀ' -- ELSE '' -- END) AS ZTEAM, C.ZZACTSS
FROM SAPHEE.ZPSTW1401 AS A INNER JOIN SAPHEE.ZMASTER01 AS B ON A.MANDT = B.MANDT AND A.PSPID = B.POSID INNER JOIN SAPHEE.ZMASTER02 AS C ON A.MANDT = C.MANDT AND A.PSPID = C.POSID AND A.POSID = C.POSID_1
--INNER JOIN SAPHEE.ZPSTW0207 AS D LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZPSTW0207 AS D ON A.MANDT = D.MANDT AND A.PSPID = D.PSPID AND A.POSID = D.POSID AND D.GUBUN = 'A'
LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZMMT012 AS E ON A.MANDT = E.MANDT AND A.WRKLFN = E.LIFNR
WHERE A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND A.GBN = #GBN#
#GUBUN2+#
#GUBUN+#
--ORDER BY A.PSPID, A.POSID ORDER BY A.WRKLFN, C.ZZACTSS, C.ZTEAM, A.PSPID, A.POSID
FOR FETCH ONLY WITH UR
